19: בָּ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> פ֤וּל <sup>6322 </sup> <n>[And] Pul</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> אַשּׁוּר֙ <sup>804 </sup> <n>of Assyria</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>against the land</n> וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>gave</n> מְנַחֵם֙ <sup>4505 </sup> <n>and Menahem</n> לְפ֔וּל <sup>6322 </sup> <n>Pul</n> אֶ֖לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>a thousand</n> כִּכַּר־ <sup>3603 </sup> <n>talents</n> כָּ֑סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>of silver</n> לִהְי֤וֹת <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> יָדָיו֙ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>that his hand</n> אִתּ֔וֹ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> לְהַחֲזִ֥יק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>might be with him to confirm</n> הַמַּמְלָכָ֖ה <sup>4467 </sup> <n>the kingdom</n> בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in his hand</n>
